docs.text: get_historical_hour Description Retrieves historical hour bars for a given time interval in the past. An hour bar consists of the opening price, the closing price, the high price, and the low price for that one-hour interval. Arguments time_in time_end Ticker Python: Test Case (Core Example) bars = pq.get_historical_hour({'api_key':api_key, 'time_in':datetime.datetime(2020,4,1,10), 'time_end':datetime.datetime(2020,4,1,12), 'Ticker':'BTCUSDT', },remote=True) Python: Test Cases (Failures) only core case implemented so far Python: Test Cases (Successes) only core case implemented so far Python: Three Interesting Examples only core case implemented so far
